Description: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Increases your chance to critically hit with all of your primary powers against players and minions by 3% and boosts your chance to critically hit by 6% against most other enemies and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.  This enhancement can only be slotted by Scrappers and may be slotted into any Scrapper damage power.
DisplayName: Superior Attuned Superior Scrappers Strike F

Powers.DisplayName: Superior Scrapper's Strike: Recharge/Critical Hit Bonus
Powers.DescShort: Increases Attack Rate, Critical Hit Chance Increase
Powers.DescLong: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.
